name: universal-js-boilerplate
description: This is a Node/Browserify/Babel/Backbone/React/etc boilerplate. To be used as an initial scaffolding tool.
author: Matthew Keas <matthiasak@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:js & npm run build:css; echo "all done!";
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css; sane 'npm run build:css' ./scss --glob='**/*.css' --glob='**/*.scss'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js;
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=eee mocha ./js/test --compilers js:babel/register --recursive; echo '----- tests done'
scripts.server: nodemon --watch . --ext js,jsx heroku-server.js & npm run watch
scripts.s: npm run start & npm run watch
scripts.bower: bower install normalize-css typeplate-starter-kit pace; cp ./bower_components/normalize-css/normalize.css ./bower_components/normalize-css/normalize.scss; echo 'bower dependencies installed';
scripts.postinstall: npm run bower && npm run build-resolver && npm run build
scripts.gh-pages: git add . && git commit -am 'cleaning up any staged and uncomitted changes' && git checkout master && npm run build && git subtree split --prefix dist -b gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && cp dist/* . && git add . && git rm --cached -r node_modules/ dist/ bower_components/ && git commit -am 'cleaning and pushing' && git push origin gh-pages:gh-pages --force && git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages;
scripts.teardown:
surge list; echo 'type a domain from above: 
 ------------ 

 '; surge teardown
